subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A pair of power-play goals gave New Jersey its fifth win in six games. The Devils are 21-3-2 since Jan. 8 and still hoping for a playoff berth after a terrible start.
snippet: A pair of power-play goals gave New Jersey its fifth win in six games. The Devils are 21-3-2 since Jan. 8 and still hoping for a playoff berth after a terrible start.
